byline.contributor: John Koblin, Sydney Ember and Jim Rutenberg contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and EMILY STEEL

abstract: On-air personalities at Fox News are dealing with internal division after abrupt departure of former chairman Roger Ailes, who is under sexual harassment investigation; some anchors side with Ailes and are upset with his ouster, while others do not.

headline.print_headline: After Ailes’s Departure, a Stony Silence at Fox
headline.main: A Stony Silence at Fox News After Ailes’s Departure

snippet: Some Fox News employees say there is an internal split inside the network, pitting those who support Roger Ailes against those who do not....
lead_paragraph: Some Fox News employees say there is an internal split inside the network, pitting those who support Roger Ailes against those who do not.
